tracker_descriptions.general: Universal tracking parameters used across multiple platforms including UTM tags, Google Ads, affiliate networks, and general analytics systems.
tracker_descriptions.meta: Facebook and Instagram tracking parameters for social media analytics, ad campaigns, and cross-platform engagement tracking.
tracker_descriptions.youtube: YouTube video platform parameters for analytics, recommendations, embedding context, and viewer engagement tracking.
tracker_descriptions.x_twitter: Twitter/X social platform parameters for tweet engagement, referral tracking, and social media analytics.
tracker_descriptions.linkedin: LinkedIn professional network parameters for business analytics, recruitment tracking, and professional content engagement.
tracker_descriptions.reddit: Reddit community platform parameters for post engagement, referral tracking, and community analytics.
tracker_descriptions.tiktok: TikTok short-form video platform parameters for content analytics, sharing tracking, and algorithm optimization.
tracker_descriptions.pinterest: Pinterest visual discovery platform parameters for pin analytics, board tracking, and visual content engagement.
tracker_descriptions.amazon: Amazon e-commerce platform parameters for affiliate programs, product recommendations, search analytics, and sales tracking.
tracker_descriptions.google: Google services parameters including search analytics, advertising tracking, and various Google product integrations.
tracker_descriptions.spotify: Spotify music streaming platform parameters for playlist analytics, music recommendations, and listening behavior tracking.
tracker_descriptions.instagram: Instagram visual social platform parameters for story analytics, post engagement, and content sharing tracking.
tracker_descriptions.github: GitHub developer platform parameters for repository analytics, notification tracking, and developer engagement metrics.
tracker_descriptions.ebay: eBay e-commerce platform parameters for auction analytics, seller tracking, and marketplace engagement metrics.
tracker_descriptions.goodreads: Goodreads book discovery platform parameters for reading analytics, book recommendations, and literary community tracking.
tracker_descriptions.imdb: Internet Movie Database parameters for film analytics, rating tracking, and entertainment content engagement.
tracker_descriptions.nytimes: New York Times news platform parameters for article analytics, subscription tracking, and news engagement metrics.
tracker_descriptions.wsj: Wall Street Journal financial news parameters for article tracking, subscription analytics, and business content engagement.
tracker_descriptions.eventbrite: Eventbrite event management platform parameters for event analytics, ticket tracking, and event marketing campaigns.
tracker_descriptions.bloomberg: Bloomberg financial news and data platform parameters for content analytics, subscription tracking, and financial market engagement.
tracker_descriptions.aliexpress: AliExpress e-commerce platform parameters for product analytics, seller tracking, and international marketplace metrics.
tracker_descriptions.conde_nast: Conde Nast media publications parameters including Vogue, Wired, GQ, and other magazine brand tracking systems.
tracker_descriptions.cbs: CBS media network parameters for content analytics, advertising tracking, and entertainment platform engagement.
tracker_descriptions.linkedin_specific: Enhanced LinkedIn tracking parameters for advanced professional analytics, recruitment metrics, and business networking insights.
tracker_descriptions.hbr_techcrunch: Harvard Business Review and TechCrunch publication parameters for business content analytics and technology news tracking.
tracker_descriptions.radio_canada: Radio-Canada media platform parameters for Canadian content analytics and public broadcasting engagement tracking.
tracker_descriptions.brave_search: Brave Search engine parameters for privacy-focused search analytics and alternative search platform tracking.
tracker_descriptions.zillow: Zillow real estate platform parameters for property analytics, real estate tracking, and housing market engagement metrics.
tracker_descriptions.feverup: Fever event discovery platform parameters for event analytics, cultural activity tracking, and entertainment engagement.
tracker_descriptions.zoopla: Zoopla UK property platform parameters for real estate analytics, property search tracking, and housing market insights.
tracker_descriptions.bandcamp: Bandcamp independent music platform parameters for artist analytics, music discovery tracking, and independent music engagement.
tracker_descriptions.gofundme: GoFundMe crowdfunding platform parameters for campaign analytics, donation tracking, and fundraising engagement metrics.
tracker_descriptions.gamefound: Gamefound tabletop gaming platform parameters for crowdfunding analytics, gaming community tracking, and board game engagement.
tracker_descriptions.washingtonpost: Washington Post news platform parameters for article analytics, subscription tracking, and political news engagement.
tracker_descriptions.ticketweb: Ticketweb event ticketing platform parameters for event analytics, ticket sales tracking, and entertainment venue engagement.
tracker_descriptions.seek: Seek job platform parameters for employment analytics, job search tracking, and career development engagement metrics.

tracker_descriptions.humblebundle: Humble Bundle digital content platform parameters for bundle analytics, gaming content tracking, and digital media engagement.
tracker_descriptions.narvar: Narvar shipping and logistics platform parameters for package tracking, delivery analytics, and e-commerce fulfillment metrics.
tracker_descriptions.dice: Dice event platform parameters for nightlife analytics, event tracking, and entertainment venue engagement metrics.
tracker_descriptions.threads: Meta Threads social platform parameters for text-based social analytics and Twitter-alternative engagement tracking.
tracker_descriptions.app_link: Branch.io and app linking platform parameters for mobile app analytics, deep linking tracking, and app engagement metrics.

tracker_descriptions.affiliate_networks: AT Internet and affiliate network parameters for commission tracking, partner analytics, and affiliate marketing performance metrics.
